comments.comments_text: A perfect lofted pass from Callum Wilson finds Joshua King (Bournemouth), who jumps highest and steers a close-range header in the countermovement of the goalkeeper. His effort was both strong and precise, and Ben Foster had no chance of stopping that. 0:3.
